message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. It's truly a valuable asset worth $10,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an excellent chance to secure such a high-value item at a reduced cost. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
